title: Frostpunk

notes: Crashes when auto saving. Using the fix here https://github.com/ValveSoftware/Proton/issues/412#issuecomment-417718193 the game runs flawlessly.
title: Frostpunk

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) R9 Fury Series (FIJI, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.7-arch1-1-ARCH, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: Like the other report says, you need to let this script run to disable autosave (https://github.com/ValveSoftware/Proton/issues/412#issuecomment-417718193) and disable cloud sync. Then it works perfectly fine. Problem is, don't forget to start the script or it will crash after ~20mins.
title: Frostpunk

notes: Graphics on Highest - not a single issue

Then it works perfectly fine. Problem is, don't forget to start the script or it will crash after ~20mins."
title: Frostpunk

notes: Works perfectly (highest graphics settings) after running the script mentioned below (https://github.com/ValveSoftware/Proton/issues/412#issuecomment-417718193) and disabling Cloud Sync.
title: Frostpunk

notes: Use the script from this comment: https://github.com/ValveSoftware/Proton/issues/412#issuecomment-417718193 ; then everything works perfectly well, even performance is great!
title: Frostpunk

notes: Having the game installed on a different hard drive was giving me an error on installation (Missing AnselSDK64.dll). Installing on the same drive where I have steam worked perfectly. No problems with autosave. Proton 3.7-8 with better FPS (+10 max) than 3.16-3
title: Frostpunk

title: Frostpunk

notes: Disabled Cloud sync, set a script to 'rm -rf' the autosave file on repeat. Still suffers occasional crashes, but runs well otherwise.
